Summary Note:
Kaiser Hofer and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Vienna. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Kaiser Hofer is a 35 year old Senior Trader from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Kaiser Hofer and Beatrix have been married since 2015. Kaiser and Beatrix have 1 child, named Franziska.
Education Background:
Kaiser graduated from Akademisches Gymnasium Graz in 2007.
Kaiser graduated from University of Innsbruck in 2014, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Kaiser Hofer is a seasoned professional with over 11 years of experience.
Kaiser Hofer launched his career as a Junior Trader at OMV AG, where he gained valuable experience from 2014 to 2016.
At Gunvor Group, he held the position of Senior Trader from 2017 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 70000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has townhouse located in Linz, worth 1010000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns condo in Krems an der Donau worth 840000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 1040000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2020, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Kaiser has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
